body_html: I mean five methods Model.weights, Model.save_weights, Model.load_weights, Model.get_weights and Model.set_weights should refer to same group of variables, since Model.weights, Model.save_weights and Model.load_weights contain extra variables, Model.get_weights and Model.set_weights should do too, otherwise the apis are quite confusing to users

body: I mean five methods `Model.weights`, `Model.save_weights`, `Model.load_weights`, `Model.get_weights` and `Model.set_weights` should refer to same group of variables, since `Model.weights`, `Model.save_weights` and `Model.load_weights` contain extra variables, `Model.get_weights` and `Model.set_weights` should do too, otherwise the apis are quite confusing to users
